critique:
The document is a formal announcement establishing an Interdepartmental Patents Board. The language is formal and bureaucratic. There is no strong indication of any particular emotion. A slight sense of joy might be inferred from the creation of a new board to handle inventions and patents, but it's very mild. Surprise, sadness, fear, and disgust are not conveyed at all.
